abstract: From the beginning, many analysts and investors have suggested that Rupert Murdoch’s $5 billion offer for Dow Jones is, to use the technical term, crazy high. (A former financial adviser to the Bancroft family, which controls Dow Jones, has called it “absolutely, insanely high.”)
lead_paragraph: From the beginning, many analysts and investors have suggested that Rupert Murdoch’s $5 billion offer for Dow Jones is, to use the technical term, crazy high. (A former financial adviser to the Bancroft family, which controls Dow Jones, has called it “absolutely, insanely high.”)

headline.main: Dow Jones Deal May Not Pay Off, Analyst Says
